channel.title: As promised, door codes!

item.title: As promised, door codes!
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

I will add all these to my all object loader so far I have succesfull got it to load the following all from one cfg files all the object packets… Doors, Double Doors, trapdoors, ladders, stairs, boxes, crates, theiving stalls, I also have a fully working way with thieving chests so that it even damages if you fail and its random if you actually unlock the lock… and its based on your lvl to basically exactly like real rs. =). Tonight I’ll start adding trees and all to the loader, then probably like farming patches etc… Basically this is my own project for hybridscape… and myself… my legacy which I will leave to the server community… a object loader in one file that does everything…

Read full topic

item.title: As promised, door codes!
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:


if (objectID == 1528) { //click = open (curtain = closed)
if ((objectX == 3259 && objectY == 3391)) {
face = -3; //south
} 
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face);
}else if (objectID == 1529) { //click = close(curtain = open)
if ((objectX == 3259 && objectY == 3391)) {
face = -3; //south
}
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID - 1), face);
}
